recipes.label: Withstand a Challenge
recipes.startdescription: This challenge is going to take its toll. A lesser person may fall, but I have withstood worse. I could approach this with the vim of Heart or the seniority of Edge.
recipes.description: This challenge is going to take its toll. A lesser person may fall, but I have withstood worse. I could approach this with the vim of Heart or the seniority of Edge.

recipes.label: Indomitable scars
recipes.startdescription: I have conquered worse before. The Colonel's lessons are carved upon my skin. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Resilient Scars
recipes.startdescription: I have survived worse before, and in my bones and in my soul I carry scars that cannot be deepened. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Straining Scars
recipes.startdescription: I have weathered worse before. I'll remember the tricks I learned from those encounters. We may yet succed.

recipes.label: Unbroken
recipes.startdescription: Like the grand Ring-Yew, who encircles and renews, I will weather this storm. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Unbent
recipes.startdescription: Like the shifting reeds, who bend but do not break, I'll weather this storm. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Unbowed
recipes.startdescription: Like the battered pines, who bleed resin, I will weather this storm. We may yet succeed.
